import soundcloud from Feedback import Feedback
client = soundcloud.Client(client_id='0c61ce131a2c1db8e56059446e33456a')
feedback = Feedback() tracks = client.get('/tracks', q="{query}", limit=9) for track in tracks: artist = client.get('/users/' + str(track.user_id)) url = "http://www.soundcloud.com/" + artist.permalink + '/' + track.permalink feedback.add_item(track.title, artist.permalink, url)
print feedback
